replies.author: Mostar梦之星
replies.txt_content:
给某个玩家/manuaddp ID essentials.fly
给某个权限组/mangaddp 权限组名 essentials.fly

replies.author: g519403080
replies.txt_content:
在groups.yml下 找到要给这个权限的分组下  复制进去
    - essentials.fly

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 玩家名字 essentials.fly

这样玩家就可以用 /fly 了

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
不好意思 错了 应该是 
manuaddp 玩家名字 essentials.fly
